name: Gamemaster (marylikesgames)
description:
Play as a gamemaster with a limited budget. Keep the crowd entertained by managing the arena. Made for Mini Jam 101: Limit (Control the environment)

CONTROLS: left mouse-click. With keyboard presses to go to next screen.

THE FIGHTER CLASSES:

  • Rogue: a weak fighter, but great at dodging
  • Brute: slow to move, but has high damage and prefers to chase down the enemy
  • Knight: well-balanced

THE ITEMS: Here are the items you can place in the arena for now

  • Potion: heals whoever picks it up for a longer show
  • Better sword: gives better damage
  • Wolf: makes things less "boring"

CREDITS:

  • Music: Crowd cheering from zapsplat.com
  • Sprites: Dungeon tileset 0x72, with expanded versions by Superdark. The tileset has been re-colored to look like a sandy arena. :)
  • Fonts: Monogram by datagoblin and Inkbit by Rodrigo BSL
